detail_desc: Lightly padded anorak in windproof and water-resistant functional fabric with reflective details. Lined hood, stand-up collar, wind flap with hook-and-loop fasteners and a zip at the top. Zipped Kangaroo pocket and adjustable tabs at the cuffs. Lined.
Soft jersey, boxy-style top with a sequined motif on the front, dropped shoulders and short sleeves.
Top in soft jersey with an interactive motif. Narrow trim around the neckline and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.

Padded jacket in woven fabric with a detachable, faux fur-trimmed hood. Zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front and a chin guard at the top. Patch front pockets with a flap and press-stud. Lined.
Knee-length cardigan in a soft, fine knit with long sleeves and no buttons.

Sleeveless playsuit in a crêpe weave with narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a gentle V-neck. Frill trim at the top, decorative buttons at the front and a narrow, elasticated seam at the waist. Unlined.

5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed denim with technical stretch that holds in and shapes the waist, thighs and bum while keeping the jeans in shape. High waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs.
Cropped top in an airy rib knit with flounced shoulder straps and a flounce at the top.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and wide legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend.
Earrings in metal and plastic in various designs, one pair of hoops. Length from 3.2 to 7.7 cm.
Sunglasses with metal and plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Classic jacket in woven fabric with a chest pocket and flap front pockets. Decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
T-shirts in soft, organic cotton jersey.
Small shoulder bag in braided straw with a paper straw shoulder strap. Flap with a concealed magnetic fastener. Lined. Depth 10 cm. Height 14 cm. Width 25 cm.
Cardigan in a soft moss knit with buttons down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Cap with glittery ears at the top, embroidered appliqués on the front and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
5-pocket jeans in washed, superstretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.

Cardigan in a soft cable knit containing some wool. Boxy fit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Buttons down the front. The polyester content of the cardigan is recycled.
Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a wide, ribbed polo neck, low dropped shoulders and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Fancy dress costume in soft pile with a hood and appliqués. Zip down the front with a chin guard, and ribbing at the cuffs and hems.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with long sleeves, buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fitted jacket in a jacquard weave with a sheen. Notch lapels and a fastening with one button at the front. Chest pocket, jetted front pockets and a single back vent. Lined.
Short-sleeved tunic in jersey with a slight sheen. Gently rounded hem, slightly longer at the back.
Wide Alice band covered in corduroy velour with a knot detail on the top.
V-neck jumper in a soft, fine-knit merino wool blend with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short, fitted dress in sturdy jersey with a V-neck, long sleeves and a slit at the back. Lined at the top.

Trainers in mesh with imitation leather details, a lightly padded edge and tongue, elasticated lacing and a hook and loop tab at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and patterned soles.

Ankle-length trousers woven in a Tencel™ lyocell blend with a high, paper bag waist with pleats and a detachable tie belt. Zip fly with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners, side pockets and straight-cut legs that taper to the hem with creases.
Long cardigan in a soft, fine knit with long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. No buttons.
Cardigan knitted in a cotton blend with a lightly brushed finish. Shawl collar, diagonal zip down the front, dropped shoulders, extra- long sleeves and an asymmetric hem.
Short dress in jacquard-weave cotton with a V-neck at the front. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps attached to eyelets at the front and a gentle A-line to the hem. Unlined.
Metal studs with faceted stones in glass and plastic. Size approx. 2 cm.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton and recycled polyester blend with a soft brushed inside. Covered elastication at the waist and ribbed hems.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with wide ribbing to hold in and shape the waist. Concealed mesh key pocket in the waistband.
Headband in a soft, fine-knit wool blend with a knot at the front.
Hipster briefs in cotton jersey with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and medium coverage at the back.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, button fly and skinny legs with quilted sections on the knees.
Hair elastics without metal clips.
Short, fitted dress in soft jersey with short sleeves.
Short, wide jumper in soft, rib-knit chenille rib with dropped shoulders and long balloon sleeves.
Treggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
5-pocket jeans in stretch denim with hard-worn details. Relaxed fit with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and tapered legs.
Jacket in soft pile with a hood with sewn-on ears, a zip down the front and side pockets in the shape of paws. Unlined.
Short dress in a softly draping viscose weave. Opening with a covered button at the back of the neck, an elasticated seam at the waist and 3/4-length sleeves with a slit at the cuffs. Unlined.
Sun hats in a soft cotton weave. Lined. Width of brim 5.5 cm.
Gently fitted, single-breasted jacket in woven fabric with peak lapels and a single button at the front. Welt front pockets, decorative buttons at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Lined.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with a fold-down shaft. Soft terry inside. Sizes 3-9 with anti-slip protectors.
Polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket, small embroidered detail on the chest and short sleeves with narrow ribbed trims. Slits at the hem.
Wide elasticated waist belt in braided plastic straw with a round metal buckle at the front. Width approx. 7 cm.
Tops in cotton sweatshirt fabric with press-studs at the back of one shoulder, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short, fine-knit socks designed to be hidden by your shoes. Ribbed section around the foot for best fit and elastication and a silicone trim at the back of the heel to keep them in place.
Long-sleeved top in soft fabric with a hood and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Jacket knitted in soft, thermal fleece with a hood, zip down the front with a chin guard and diagonal side pockets. Jersey trims around the hood, pockets, cuffs and hem. The jacket is made partly from recycled polyester.

Microfibre body with a super push-up bra and lacing at the front. The body has a light sculpting effect on the waist and bum. The bra has underwired, thickly padded cups that maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back. Lined gusset.
T-shirt in soft jersey with an appliqué and print motif on the front, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a gently rounded hem.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist, textured plastic rings at the sides and medium coverage at the back.

Blouse in a softly draping weave with a sheen. Draped neckline with a small opening and covered button at the back of the neck. Double-layered front, decorative buttons on one shoulder and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Oversized top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, dropped shoulders and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Fully lined sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with mesh details, a racer back and wide elasticated hem. Medium support.
Cotton canvas trainers with lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Canvas linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Short-sleeved top in a viscose weave with a V-neck, buttons at the front, a seam under the bust and a gentle flare to the hem.
Short dress in patterned jersey with a draped V-neck and sewn-in wrapover at the top. Long sleeves, cuffs with metal buttons, an elasticated seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Jumper in a cotton knit containing some cashmere with a stand-up collar and zip at the top.
Cape in mesh with a shimmering print and chiffon-lined hood.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. T-shirt top with a print motif. Shorts with an elasticated waist.
Blouse in an airy, patterned cotton weave with elastication around the top and short, flounced, raglan sleeves.

Set with a short-sleeved football top and football shorts in fast-drying functional fabric. Top with a print motif front and back. Shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and print motifs on the legs.
Long-sleeved tops in soft organic cotton jersey.
Patterned fancy dress costume with a zip down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Hood with embroidery and appliqués, and a detachable tail with a hook and loop fastening.
Swim shorts with an elasticated, drawstring waist and fake fly. Soft mesh inner shorts.

Short dress in softly draping satin with a deep neckline, pearly buttons down the front and short puff sleeves with pleats and cuffs. Seam under the bust, elastication at the back of the waist and a softly draping skirt. Unlined.
Long, sleeveless satin dress with a V-neck, narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back and a long slit in one side. Partly lined.
Long-sleeved top in sturdy cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.

Jumpsuit in a crêpe weave with a lined, fitted bodice with side support and a concealed silicone trim at the top. Seam at the waist with a detachable tie belt, concealed zip in one side and wide, ankle-length legs.
Baby Exclusive. Mittens in soft, rib-knit wool. Sizes 0-6M without thumbs.
Smartphone bag made from faceted plastic beads with a narrow shoulder strap. Width 11 cm. Height 17.5 cm.
